quote: To live in peace, love peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace begins with a touch of unconditional love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace is an eternal journey we begin in the mind by changing our thoughts so that we can fill the world with love and kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace begins in the mind with a simple thought of love and kindness for all.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace is always beautiful.
author: Walt Whitman,  Leaves of Grass

quote: Peace is a road to happiness and the future.War is a road to destruction and death.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace lets us to be more pleasant.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To find peace, live in the moment with joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To be in peace, grow calmness and compassion in your heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You find peace by becoming a source of peace for others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To win peace, fight with love not with violence.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Live in the beauty of love to live in peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace is always pleasant, always kind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace begins with a smile..
author: Mother Teresa

quote: There is peace even in the storm
author: Vincent van Gogh,  The Letters of Vincent van Gogh

quote: If you want peace, fill your mind with peaceful thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To pursue peace, be patient and peaceful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be a fountain of peace to find peace everywhere.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace always grows in a loving and compassionate mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace is the inner silence that calms all outer noises.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To live a life in perfect harmony, create true peace in your heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Create the kind of peace in your mind that you want to see in the world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Hope for peace!Dream for peace!Act for peace!Live in peace!Life is for peace!
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Free your mind completely to find true peace in this world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace is not only the goal, it is the game itself.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The quickest way to experiencing the peace inside, is to learn to recognize when I am not at peace.
author: James Patrick McDonald

quote: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Peace does not mean an absence of conflicts; differences will always be there. Peace means solving these differences through peaceful means; through dialogue, education, knowledge; and through humane ways.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Peace is not so much a political mandate as it is a shared state of consciousness that remains elevated and intact only to the degree that those who value it volunteer their existence as living examples of the same... Peace ends with the unraveling of individual hope and the emergence of the will to worship violence as a healer of private and social dis-ease.
author: Aberjhani,  The American Poet Who Went Home Again

quote: Think about peace; act with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Find truth inside you to find peace in the world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Fall in love with peace to enjoy the journey we call life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Peace is not happenstance. It is a living fire that must be fed constantly. It must be tended to with vigilance, else it dies out.
author: Libba Bray,  The Sweet Far Thing

quote: When your mind is overflowing with peace, you will find peace all around you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: be it peace or happinesslet it enfold you
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: If you are not able to find peace within yourself, no one will be able to bring you peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Let peace bloom in your heart like a fresh flower.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Some seek and find peace in life; some have to wait for peace in the afterlife.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace is what enables development and is critical in providing opportunities to young people. Efforts to preserve peace are absolutely vital in bringing prosperity and hope for the future.
author: Kim Yuna

quote: Peace in my mind,Peace in my heart,Peace in my dreams And peace in my thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Going to war to establish peace will not bring peace. It will just kill you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: World peace starts with the Creator- Jesus!!
author: Mary Kate

quote: Peace begins with a kind gesture and Namaste.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: How beautiful it is to have inner peace while knowing that everyone is busy with their own battles in life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace is not the absence of conflict but the presence of creative alternatives for responding to conflict -- alternatives to passive or aggressive responses, alternatives to violence.
author: Dorothy Thompson

quote: Let us all love each other. Every morning, let us sing a song of peace together.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We will not be able to find peace if our minds are burning with the fires of resentment. Let us forgive and forget to create peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Peace is not a result inside us from everything around us. Peace is not submissive nor passive. On the contrary, peace is an overwhelming force which comes from within us, disrespectful of everything around us, a firm coalition of spirit and soul standing against all the unrest that abounds.
author: C. JoyBell C.
